title: 22: No Such Thing As A Magic Camel Filter
content: This week in the QI office, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Andy (@andrewhunterm) discuss how to post a human, ancient ham, apes using iPads and the definition of Wales.
contentSnippet: This week in the QI office, Dan (@schreiberland), James (@jamesharkin), Anna (@nosuchthing) and Andy (@andrewhunterm) discuss how to post a human, ancient ham, apes using iPads and the definition of Wales.
